members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the input in the comboBox

members.name: dismissMenu
members.descriptionHtml: If there is a menu open this will dismiss the menu

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Specific styles for each comboBox option. If you intend to give common styles to all comboBox option please use the prop comboBoxOptionStyles

members.name: useAriaLabelAsText
members.descriptionHtml: In scenarios where embedded data is used at the text prop, we will use the ariaLabel prop to set the aria-label and preview text. Default to false

members.name: optionText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the text inside the comboBox option. This should be used instead of the description inside IButtonStyles because we custom render the text in the comboBox options.

members.name: optionTextWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the comboBox option text's wrapper.

members.name: allowFreeform
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the ComboBox is free form, meaning that the user input is not bound to provided options. Defaults to false.

members.name: autoComplete
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the ComboBox auto completes. As the user is inputing text, it will be suggested potential matches from the list of options. If the combo box is expanded, this will also scroll to the suggested option, and give it a selected style.

members.name: buttonIconProps
members.descriptionHtml: The IconProps to use for the button aspect of the combobox

members.name: caretDownButtonStyles
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the caret down button.

members.name: comboBoxOptionStyles
members.descriptionHtml: Default styles that should be applied to ComboBox options, in case an option does not come with user-defined custom styles

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IComboBox interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: dropdownMaxWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Custom max width for dropdown

members.name: dropdownWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Custom width for dropdown (unless useComboBoxAsMenuWidth is undefined or false)

members.name: getClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Custom function for providing the classNames for the ComboBox. Can be used to provide all styles for the component instead of applying them on top of the default styles.

members.name: isButtonAriaHidden
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the 'aria-hidden' attribute on the ComboBox's button element instructing screen readers how to handle the element. This element is hidden by default because all functionality is handled by the input element and the arrow button is only meant to be decorative.

members.name: keytipProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional keytip for this combo box

members.name: multiSelect
members.descriptionHtml: Optional mode indicates if multi-choice selections is allowed. Default to false

members.name: onChange
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when either: 1) the selected option changes 2) a manually edited value is submitted. In this case there may not be a matched option if allowFreeform is also true (and hence only value would be true, the other parameter would be null in this case)

members.name: onChanged
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated, use `onChange` instead.

members.name: onItemClick
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when a ComboBox item is clicked.

members.name: onMenuDismissed
members.descriptionHtml: Function that gets invoked when the ComboBox menu is dismissed

members.name: onMenuOpen
members.descriptionHtml: Function that gets invoked when the ComboBox menu is launched

members.name: onPendingValueChanged
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when the user changes the pending value in ComboBox

members.name: onRenderLowerContent
members.descriptionHtml: Add additional content below the callout list.

members.name: onResolveOptions
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when the options should be resolved, if they have been updated or if they need to be passed in the first time

members.name: onScrollToItem
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when the ComboBox requests the list to scroll to a specific element

members.name: options
members.descriptionHtml: Collection of options for this ComboBox

members.name: scrollSelectedToTop
members.descriptionHtml: When options are scrollable the selected option is positioned at the top of the callout when it is opened (unless it has reached the end of the scrollbar).

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Custom styles for this component

members.name: text
members.descriptionHtml: Value to show in the input, does not have to map to a combobox option

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by HOC.

members.name: useComboBoxAsMenuWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to use the ComboBoxes width as the menu's width

members.name: value
members.descriptionHtml: Value to show in the input, does not have to map to a combobox option Deprecated, use `text` instead.

members.name: callout
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the callout.

members.name: container
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the container which has the ComboBox and the label

members.name: divider
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a divider in the options.

members.name: errorMessage
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the error Message text of the comboBox.

members.name: header
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a header in the options.

members.name: input
members.descriptionHtml: Base styles for the input element - which contains the currently selected option.

members.name: inputDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the input element when comboBox is disabled.

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the label element of the ComboBox.

members.name: labelDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the label element of the ComboBox in the disabled state.

members.name: optionsContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the container of all the Combobox options Includes the headers and dividers.

members.name: optionsContainerWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the optionsContainerWrapper.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Base styles for the root element of all ComboBoxes.

members.name: rootDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for when the comboBox is disabled. These styles override all the other styles. NOTE : Hover (or) Focused (or) active styles are not applied for disabled comboBoxes.

members.name: rootDisallowFreeForm
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for variant of ComboBox where allowFreeForm is false in the props.

members.name: rootError
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the root element for variant of ComboBox with an errorMessage in the props.

members.name: rootFocused
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for when the ComboBox is focused. These styles are applied for all comboBoxes except when the comboBox is disabled.

members.name: rootHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for when the ComboBox is hovered. These styles are applied for all comboBoxes except when the comboBox is disabled.

members.name: rootPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for when the ComboBox is active. These styles are applied for all comboBoxes except when the comboBox is disabled.
